about_the_game: Rocococo Audiogame Fantastique is a music-based, singleplayer, audiogame adventure that has no visuals and can be played by anyone fully without sight to fully sighted. Using just your ears and spatial audio tech, you must listen, discover, and re-assemble songs to help the robo-Butler defeat the evil Queen! This free PC demo is a sneak peak and lets you try out the first few levels. Don't worry as the full game has many more levels and additional game mechanics to learn and master to win the game. Zut alors!!

This free PC demo is a sneak peak and lets you try out the first few levels. Don't worry as the full game has many more levels and additional game mechanics to learn and master to win the game. Zut alors!!

short_description: Free audiogame demo! Rocococo Audiogame Fantastique is a music-based, singleplayer, adventure that has no visuals and can be played by anyone fully without sight to fully sighted. Get your ears ready to help you find all the music and defeat the evil Queen ... Zut alors!!
